name: Saint Joseph Leaning on a Table
description: Saint Joseph Leaning on a Table; Sassoferrato (Giovanni Battista Salvi) (Italian, 1609 - 1685); about 1650; Black chalk, heightened with white chalk, on beige paper, squared in black chalk; 25.1 x 18.4 cm (9 7/8 x 7 1/4 in.); 90.GB.68; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Saint Joseph Leaning on a Table
medium: Black chalk, heightened with white chalk, on beige paper, squared in black chalk
